original_text: When Gideon's 300 men made a noise with their trumpets, it confused the Midianites everywhere in their camp. The Lord caused them to attack one another with their swords. Their army ran away to Beth Shittah, on the road towards Zererah. They ran as far as the border of Abel Meholah, near Tabbath.
korean_text: 삼백 명이 나팔을 불 때에 여호와께서 그 온 진영에서 친구끼리 칼로 치게 하시므로 적군이 도망하여 스레라의 벧 싯다에 이르고 또 답밧에 가까운 아벨므홀라의 경계에 이르렀으며

sentences.original_text: When Gideon's 300 men made a noise with their trumpets
it confused the Midianites everywhere in their camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 그들의 진영 모든 곳에서 미디안 사람들을 혼란시켰습니다

sentences.original_text: The Lord caused them to attack one another with their swords
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 그들이 서로 칼로 공격하게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: Their army ran away to Beth Shittah
They ran as far as the border of Abel Meholah
